DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to investigate the effect of BI 10773, hydrochlorothiazide and torasemide on changes in serum and urine electrolytes. Furthermore the pharmacodynamic and pharmacokinetic interactions between BI 10773 and diuretics should be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics of Empagliflozin and Torasemide in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. male and female patients of type 2 diabetes
